mapper.select: SELECT c.commentId, c.userId, c.postId, c.content, c.createdAt, c.updatedAt, u.nickname, u.profileImg FROM Comment as c JOIN User as u ON c.userId = u.userId WHERE c.postId=#{postId} ORDER BY c.updatedAt LIMIT 3 ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Comment(postId, userId, content) VALUES (#{comment.postId}, #{comment.userId}, #{comment.content});
